Uses of Class
distances.primary.DistanceMeasure

  • Packages that use DistanceMeasure 
    Package Description
    distances.primary  
    distances.sparse  

    • Uses of DistanceMeasure in distances.primary

      Subclasses of DistanceMeasure in distances.primary 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BhattacharyyaDistance
      Meant for measuring distances between probability distributions.
      class  BrayCurtis
      This class implements the Bray-Curtis distance.
      class  Canberra
      This class implements the Canberra distance.
      class  ColorsAndCodebooksMetric
      There are two types of attributes in the array, so they have to be weighted differently.
      class  CosineMetric
      This class implements the standard cosine distance.
      class  DifferenceVarianceMetric 
      class  DTW
      A dummy class for now, for a project where the distances were already provided.
      class  LocalImageFeatureMetric
      Distance between SIFTVector-s.
      class  MandelEllis
      A dummy class for audio distance calculations.
      class  Manhattan
      Manhattan distance between feature arrays or DataInstance objects.
      class  ManhattanWeighted
      Manhattan distance between feature arrays or DataInstance objects.
      class  MaxMetric
      Maximal distance between some of the objects' features.
      class  Minkowski3D
      This class implements a special case of the Minkowski metric on 3D data.
      class  MinkowskiMetric
      Euclidean/Minkowski distance family.
      class  MinkowskiMetricWeighted
      Euclidean/Minkowski distance family.
      class  SIFTImageHistogramMetric
      Essentially, Manhattan metric, but the distance between the data instances is calculated as the distances between their integer histogram arrays.
      class  SIFTSpatialMetric
      This class expects SIFTVector-s or their float arrays.
      class  SymmetricKLDivergence
      Calculates the symmetrized KL divergence between two probability distributions.
      class  TanimotoDistance
      This class implements Tanimoto distance, which is calculated as a number of different elements in the two sets scaled by the total in the union.
